chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Choice of an Ajah
chapters.info: Mezar Kurin, p. 104—Short Domani man with gray hair at his temples, now one of the Asha'man. He was one of three powerful Dedicated who recently disappeared with Logain. He has since been raised to the Asha'man; he has not been himself since since his “special” lessons with the M'Hael started, which started with his Turning to the Shadow. His gaze now looks like a deep cavern. He now spends most of his time with Coteren and Taim's other lackeys. See also Ablar, Logain; Kajima, Welyn; Sandomere, Donalo.
